summary: An FBI email from June 27, 2019, attaching a report on Jeffrey Epstein's travel records from June 1-27, 2019. The email notes his last recorded outbound flight was to Paris on June 14, 2019, and discusses limitations in tracking travel to U.S. territories like the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses a search of his travel records from June 1-27, 2019, noting his last outbound flight was to Paris on June 14, 2019.

events.title: Epstein's last recorded outbound flight to Paris
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's last travel record shows an OUTBOUND flight to Paris, France.

events.title: FBI travel record search period
events.description: The FBI conducted a search of Jeffrey Epstein's travel records from June 1, 2019, to June 27, 2019, at noon.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's last recorded travel before June 27, 2019, was an outbound flight to Paris on June 14, 2019.
The FBI's search capabilities for Epstein's travel were limited for trips to U.S. territories (like the Virgin Islands) because they are not always logged as international travel by CBP.
Inconsistencies in OUTBOUND/INBOUND records for travel to/from the islands are attributed to variations in how CBP inputs data.
